title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch From Mercury
overview: A.S. (Ad Stella) 122â€•An era when a multitude of corporations have entered space and built a huge economic system. A lone girl from the remote planet Mercury transfers to the Asticassia School of Technology, run by the Beneritt Group which dominates the mobile suit industry.Her name is Suletta Mercury. With a scarlet light burning in her pure heart, this girl walks step by step through a new world.
